attributes.action: Parliament to reflect accurately the will of the British people
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned members of public call upon our Government and our Parliament to reflect accurately the will of the British people.
Failures to represent and reflect accurately of our feelings of what is happening in Gaza is bringing the people and nation into disrepute with the world.
We call on all Members of Parliament to examine their conscious and answer to the failure to stop the slaughter of defenseless innocents -children, women and men by one of the most powerfully equipped armies in the world.
We belief that The British Government - Our Government - is an active participant in the aggression against the Palestinian people in Gaza by selling of armaments to the Israeli Military - The IDF, as well as the purchasing and financing from the Israeli military industries to use on the people of Gaza and West Bank.
We call upon British Government to break the illegal blockade and provide floating hospitals and power generating ships off the coast of Gaza as the minimum.
